document_data.name: Urkamond Thond
document_data.mainbody: '''Urkamond Thond''' was a wealthy [[aristocrat]] from [[Saerloon]], [[Sembia]], who made his fortune in the textile trade.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|30}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 24: An Inn For Adventurers}}
document_data.Abilities: Urkamond was a sharp-witted fellow that made shrewd business deals in textiles.
document_data.History: Even though he could easily afford better, he was known to stay at the [[Whistling Wizard]] inn when he passed through [[Voonlar]]. He   was of the opinion that it was "Far better than I'd been led to believe. If all one demands is fair food and a place to sleep unmolested, it serves quite adequately."
